children.name: We want Ψ to be “easily computable”

A way to compute potentials of games

children.name: Master Theorem
If Ψ is sound and complete, then Ψ-FVI terminates and computes the energy values of the game.
keywords: If Ψ is sound and complete, then Ψ-FVI terminates and computes the energy values of the game.
Ψ is sound if Ψ(G) ≤ En(G).
Ψ is complete if Ψ(G) = 0 implies En(G) = 0.
